appName: お願い トラックくん - Onegai Truck-kun
displayName: お願い トラックくん - Onegai Truck-kun
display_name: お願い トラックくん - Onegai Truck-kun
display_long_description:
Get ready to meet your fate - Truck-kun is back, and this time, he’s not just sending you to one fantasy world… he’s got seven lined up for you, and they’re all absolutely bonkers.

Welcome to Onegai Truck-kun, a fast-paced, WarioWare-inspired XR mini-game experience where every crash launches you into a new, unpredictable world. In this over-the-top demo, you'll leap from dimension to dimension, each with its own chaotic set of mini-games, ridiculous rules, and wild VR interactions.

Every time you “pass on” - WHAM! - Truck-kun shows up and sends you flying into the next ridiculous reality. It’s fast, it’s weird, and it’s unlike anything else on the Meta Quest Store.

🌀 Can you survive the Isekai Gauntlet and uncover the truth behind Truck-kun’s multiversal rampage?

NOTE: This is a demo version of the game featuring a curated selection of worlds and mini-games. Stay tuned for the full version of Truck-kun Isekai Express, packed with even more dimensions, challenges, and high-speed hilarity.

💥 Truck-kun doesn’t wait. So look both ways… or don’t.
